website_summaries.verdict: This convertible heavy-duty bedside commode duplicates many of the functions found in actual rehabilitation models, including a sturdy frame and drop-down arms.
pros: Can be configured as a bedside commode or elevated toilet
cons: Plastic seat can warp under pressure
Critical joints are bolted, not welded

customer_reviews.title: Such a good product, thank you.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great item. I had surgery recently for a split Femur, with a Titanium rod now running the length of my thigh. I could not get to the bathroom in time during the night. It is very well made and sturdy, doesn't flip over , if I lean on just one armrest. I used one just like it in rehab, and ordered it before I got home. The smaller ones would rub right on where one set of clamps were located on my thigh.
customer_reviews.author: Dollymop22

customer_reviews.title: A Very Good Commode
customer_reviews.text: This commode is very sturdy and wide enough for use; mainly for adult use I should think. If you align the handles of the bucket with the wire support below the bucket will NOT fall through. The Tashi-Box bags sold here on Amazon work well with the bucket. The commode is well built and with normal use will last a long time. I am glad that I purchased this one.
customer_reviews.author: W. R. Furnas

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome product. A friend loaned us a regular size ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product. A friend loaned us a regular size one and it was hard for my husband to bend his knees getting down on it after bilateral knee replacement. Although he doesn't need the heavy duty aspect of it, this one is wider-allowing him more room to move is legs apart when bending down. I recommend it for anyone who has trouble with squatting
customer_reviews.author: robin e henke

customer_reviews.title: Ease of assembly, fits over elongated or regular toilets, and it's sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Measurements in product description accurate (important to be sure it will fit over the commode in your bathroom). Xtra width is great. Don't know how well the seat would accommodate a weight at the maximum limit. Plenty firm for a 250lb-r with a wide girth. Overall, a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: cherylspinosa

customer_reviews.title: super heavy duty and really easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to assemble. The only thing I would change is it would be nice if the seat was oblong instead of round. My husband is a big guy (6'3" and 340lbs). When he sits on the seat, there isn't a lot of room for everything to fit in the bowl. Other than that, the commode is very sterdy and easily holds his weight.
customer_reviews.author: OJ

customer_reviews.title: Small seat
customer_reviews.text: This is supposed to be a Bariatric product. The frame is perfect. Sturdy, wide and adjustable height. PROBLEM: the seat is too small and very flimsy. It hurts to sit on it. The Seat is NOT Bariatric! If this had a Bariatric seat it would be a perfect product.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Livergood

customer_reviews.title: Durable product, especially when used with commodes liners!  Great for injured, elderly or immobile.
customer_reviews.text: This has been the most helpful aid while I recover from a broken leg! It's three pivots with a walker from my recliner to the toilet. I use the commode liners with individual absorbent pads. No dumping into toilet. We even add kitty litter to the fresh commode bags. The commode itself is durable and the are rests make it easier to lift off of it and stabilize.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Folding Commode
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and the user is very pleased with how sturdy and well made this commode is. She is a regular size (170 lbs) and it is wide, however she says it is very heavy duty and exceeds her expectations.
customer_reviews.author: central ohio amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: It is nice and wide, but still fit in our narrow bathroom which was nice. However it was very difficult to maneuver into a good position over the toilet. All that aside, it is very uncomfortable. There is no padding or support so when you sit on it, your legs dig into the front bar. I will be returning it today.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Wide and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I am a tall, heavy set person and this commode was perfect. It s wider than most, so I could sit comfortably, and maneuver easily when cleaning myself. Very sturdy. Excellent quality at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bricka

customer_reviews.title: the seat is not big enough for a 200 lb man
customer_reviews.text: If you are a small person, ie woman, you could pee and poo with this unit. We got it and set it up easily. When trying to have a man 200 lbs sit on it, his parts would not fit! Writing to the company they said they had no bigger size seats to clamp on the frame. I should get the unit #....., which the website said they don't make any longer. Even it was never used, Amazon will not return personal care items. I had to give it away. word to the wise, check the seat size, that is most important. It is smaller than a usual toilet seat.
customer_reviews.author: mystery reader

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvement.
customer_reviews.text: After hip surgery, my husband, a big and tall guy needed a larger toilet due to the bad configuration of our bathroom. I ordered this and it looked like it would work well. It is sturdy and height can be adjusted, but the commode piece itself is too small. He found that all his parts wouldn’t fit inside and still be able to wipe - plus the edges of that piece were sharp plastic. Ouch! If you make a bariatric chair, it needs to fit all the parts. I hope you will correct future versions.
customer_reviews.author: Books2 Love

customer_reviews.title: It is junk!!!!
customer_reviews.text: the cheap plastic seat bows when you sit down, at times will pinch you, puts cutting painful pressure to backs of legs as the seat sags by a full inch. seat and seatback jump off the rear cross bar frequently and have to be reinstalled. would not recommend to anyone including my worst enemy. situation would best be summed up using a lot of cussing.
customer_reviews.author: thomas mikalowsky

customer_reviews.title: Go with confidence.
customer_reviews.text: Width of seating area and seat is good. Large body- can accommodate a bit over 250 lbs. and was pleasantly surprised it could hold my weight. Live safer, especially when you cannot get to the bathroom. Able to use with confidence and reduced the fatigue on my body by not having to hop to home bathroom. Provided "peace of mind" that I could use close to my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Big Girls Can Carry

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great help for those having surgery, especially knee replacement surgery. We used it over the existing oval shaped commode for added height. It was sturdy enough for a 6 ‘ 215 lb man to use for support and would sustain much more. Well made and easily put together. Great product and worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: A S

customer_reviews.title: The seat and lid have a design flaw
customer_reviews.text: The seat and lid do not stay on. Amazon replaced the first one and the second one does the same. Called the company for a replacement part and ended up automated response hell and then in a chat room with a person who knew nothing and was not helpful at all. Thanks to Amazon for helping me. If you can live with the seat and lid popping off this is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: maggie ruth clausell

customer_reviews.title: Superior Product that is high quality & works well
customer_reviews.text: This folding commode is a superior product that is high quality and works well. The wider space of 24", instead of the typical 18", between the two arms makes all the difference for the user. The frame is very sturdy even though it can be folded up for transport or storage. The seat and lid are strong. The deeper than usual bucket is good to prevent splashing. I compared products and read many reviews before deciding on this model, and it paid off by being the right choice. I think you'll be happy with this portable commode!
customer_reviews.author: 2nd Childhood

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy frame but flimsy small seat
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy frame but the toilet seat is too small and very uncomfortable. Don't understand why there's such a small seat made out of flimsy hard plastic. Wish the seat matched the sturdy frame. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and stable.
customer_reviews.text: It says heavy duty. It should say normal duty. The smaller, typical commode is not comfortable unless you are a small adult. Sturdy and stable.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan in Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Drive Medical Heavy Duty Bariatric Folding Commode, Gray
customer_reviews.text: Very easy assembly and extremely sturdy. Just what we needed. Received it in two days. If you need this type of product I can highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Bariatric Commode reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for someone else. I would give it a 5 star review if it came with a solid seat however the toilet seat is wide and comfortable enough for daily use. No good for use with sliding board.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Camping with some one who’s disabled
customer_reviews.text: My dad is Disabled and he misses a lot of outing like camping so me and my sis. wanted to take him camping for the first time in a long time but I was worried about how the whole going the bathroom was going to work out and so I started looking for something and ended up here and ended buying this for him and it was perfect he loved it and wants to go back (camping) we are very happy by the way he’s a big guy (279) 5’11) and it worked perfectly nice and firm
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, sturdy, adjustable product. It feels safe and comfortable... considering what it is. No regrets on this purchase. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: HHW

customer_reviews.title: Need to return item.
customer_reviews.text: This pkg was delivered damaged and I have been told it cannot be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Happiness

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Not what I would consider heavy duty. My husband is a big boy, it has held him so far. Not comfortable, and the seat/lids want to pop off. But at least he can get off the head with the use of safety bars
customer_reviews.author: roxy jc

customer_reviews.title: Seat is unbelievably and ridiculously small.
customer_reviews.text: For a frame that can hold up to 450 lbs the seat looks like a toddler potty training seat. What were the designers thinking...oh wait, they weren't. And the bucket falls down. What a mess it would be in a bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: josiebops

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble and only took minutes. It's extremely sturdy and easy to clean. When I need to move it or store it when she has company, it only takes a bit to fold it up and move it. In use, it does take quite a bit of room so make sure you pay attention to the measurements.
customer_reviews.author: MsPatty

customer_reviews.title: Best seat in the house.
customer_reviews.text: Listen to me pay the extra and get this Heavy Duty model. I have a problem walking but I can sit on this commode no problem. Just open the box unfold the commode put it over your toilet done. Here's a tip if you have a handicap toilet and you have trouble sitting I did get one of these and put it over the handicap toilet it works great.
customer_reviews.author: James Russell

customer_reviews.title: Shaky toilet
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that I have more room to get up and down off my commode because I have a bad back and legs but when sitting on it it’s not very sturdy and it shakes it suppose to hold up to 350 lbs I think but I’m not nearly that big I just wanted something bigger than I had because of my back and legs hurting me so bad.
customer_reviews.author: Val 318

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this following spinal fusion surgery. This was the one used in rehab home. I am a larger woman and like the sturdiness and width of this product. We only use on toilet so i dont know how the bucket part works.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Courson

customer_reviews.title: The legs pertrude out.
customer_reviews.text: My sister loves this item because it is large and heavy duty, however it is too large for the space. She was locked in the bathroom today because she could not open the door as the front legs covered part of the door. Great item but make sure you have the space.
customer_reviews.author: Drey

customer_reviews.title: very good width, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one we have used of this model. Pros: adjustable height, very good width, comfortable, sturdy. It lasted over a year before the 'cons' started to appear. Cons: Over time the covering on the arms breaks down over time letting a bolt poke up midway which scratched my forearms and the front end curve got a hole that abraded my hands when pushing up to stand. The gray coating rusts at the joins.
customer_reviews.author: Elstone

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: It works well for my mother. She needed more room between the arms. She is under 200 lbs, but the standard one was a little tight. The frame is very sturdy. However, I feel the seat and lid are a little flimsy for something that is called “heavy duty.”
customer_reviews.author: Carol H

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I had my left foot amputated in December 2019. I feel very secure using this potty chair. It fits over my toilet and is very sturdy to help me move from my wheelchair to the toilet and back to my wheelchair. I
customer_reviews.author: Brenda M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: RETURNING THE COMMODE.
customer_reviews.text: The product is not true to size. I have tried to return the commode unused. I called the company with promise of a RMA. As of this date I have not received a form.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Fowler-Dye

customer_reviews.title: ... to have a bedside commode and this one is perfect! Really helps when you cannot get up and ...
customer_reviews.text: Needed to have a bedside commode and this one is perfect! Really helps when you cannot get up and get to a restroom that is upstairs.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Simonton

customer_reviews.title: Back Rail Missing
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble however the back rail was not in the box
customer_reviews.author: Evonne Sims

customer_reviews.title: great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Ours arrived without one of the rubber stoppers at the end of the leg. Customer service took care of the problem right away. We modified it slightly to re-enforce the toilet seat.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Extremely poor quality control. Non existent assembly instructions.  Completely unhelpful customer service agent
customer_reviews.text: Received this unit yesterday for my wife coming home from the hospital tomorrow. Unit is obviously bent as it won't assemble without forcing it together. When forced together, the seat/lid won't stay on due to the distortion in the frame. Called Drive Medical and spoke to "Kenny". His response "contact Amazon".... Thanks Dude.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just don't lean back
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sturdy, but toilet seat detaches easily if leaning back while sitting. I'm going to try another one or install some plywood.
customer_reviews.author: Norman

customer_reviews.title: Nice and large
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful oversized commode. Our old commode was small and dug into my husbands new hip replacement. This one is wonderful. It is large so you will need a large bathroom for it to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Connolly

customer_reviews.title: Broken Leg
customer_reviews.text: This was a life saver after I broke my leg last year. I never knew how low toilets are and how hard to lift yourself up.
customer_reviews.author: C.R. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Portable Cammode
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for travel on vacations. Folds up fairly flat so doesn't take up a lot of room in vehicle. Not at all flimsy. Very sturdy. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jan K.

customer_reviews.title: Bedside commode
customer_reviews.text: Serves it’s purpose. It’s very sturdy holds the man I work for who is very large 250 pounds plus. Easy to assemble and adjust height.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Nevarez

customer_reviews.title: OUCH
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the unit with the exception of the seat. When i sit on the unit it pinches the back of my legs. There should be some sort of spacer on the seat or horizontal bar to keep this from happening.
customer_reviews.author: star witch

customer_reviews.title: Feels safe and secure
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed with my disability. I feel safe and secure during use, not afraid it will collapse on me. Easy to keep clean with liners. Glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty...NO LIES
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Ordered for my mother who is 80 years old and weighs 250 lbs. No more getting stuck on the sides because of the narrowness of the previous commode! This one is so comfortable on the sides she can have her purse and her pup on each side lol! Great buy and most of all STURDY!!
customer_reviews.author: O Cisneros

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy. Only problem is that the seat and lid should be made of a heavier, stronger plastic. It can pinch loose skin when sitting.
customer_reviews.author: Marla Burton

customer_reviews.title: Wide enough for hip replacement dressings
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this chair after finding that the same chair with more narrow width was not sufficient for hip replacement patient (dressings on hip). This one was great. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Scout53

customer_reviews.title: Product very well built.
customer_reviews.text: We use it for when we go camping, we installed it in our 4x6 haulmark trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Joe diaz

customer_reviews.title: Especially good medical supplies.
customer_reviews.text: It is so much better, more well built, than any other I had seen. I would like to purchase a spare seat and cover. Sally8lang@aol.com. I also bought actual toilet safety rails that are really great. So easy to get ready for use.
customer_reviews.author: sally langton

customer_reviews.title: good for the money
customer_reviews.text: It works very sturdy for the larger person. Wish the seat was a bit softer.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Get this one!
customer_reviews.text: Item came on time, as described. Very easy to put together and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Way too big for older homes. Deminsions should be listed and highlighted
customer_reviews.author: bpar

customer_reviews.title: Great product for elderly people
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my elderly mother which is 84 years old. It is convenient for her at her age.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big bootie :)
customer_reviews.text: Bariatric so wide enough and sturdy enough to hold me. For the price it was ok, I wanted it a little more sturdy, the seat and lid pop off frequently but easy to pop back on. Love the round bucket ( last potty I had the pot was oblong and slid into place. It was always falling off with during in it. Never get anything but round
customer_reviews.author: Deborah E. Chism

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, wish it came apart to store
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, wish it came apart to store. Folds just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Nikitasectionone

customer_reviews.title: Easy as 123
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, easy to clean, and easy to fold and store
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Heerboth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bedside commode.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Roomy to be able to reach body areas. The others were too small in width. Sturdy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother. Fits right over toilet. Works good.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M. LaBanca

customer_reviews.title: Get's the job done
customer_reviews.text: I picked this model because it is wider. It works. It will pinch the bottom of your thigh on occasion. A good deal for the price and function. If a person needed a long term solution you might want another model because of the pinched thigh problem.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN ALLISON

customer_reviews.title: Strudy
customer_reviews.text: Good and sturdy and most importantly adjustable for people with short legs.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen W.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! Sturdier and larger than expected (even though I thought I measured correctly). Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.author: lynn kelly

customer_reviews.title: Not really for me.
customer_reviews.text: It pinched wasn’t as good as I though it would
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Plastic seat giving way.
customer_reviews.text: Plastic is giving away on seat. I have the Drive Medical Heavy Duty Bariatric Fokding Commode. $75.87. Any guaranty. My weight 390. Product limit 650#. I think it should hold up. Any help???
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn D

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: sturdy and strong could use a deeper bucket though works great for rustic camping
customer_reviews.author: LK Pomranky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT "TOOL" AFTER JOINT REPLACEMENT, FOLDS UP QUICK AND EASY, ADJUSTABLE HEIGHT
customer_reviews.author: Kenny D

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, i got this because we're remodeling a house. The lid for the pail is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: dammwilliams

customer_reviews.title: Buy this commode
customer_reviews.text: This thing could hold up a small house. What a great commode.
customer_reviews.author: 7snap

customer_reviews.title: Safe Bariatric BS Commode
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a commode chair for wider hips that could safely hold a 250-300 lb person. This product was easy to assemble and fit the bill. Have had no issues after using it for 6 weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Sabourin

customer_reviews.title: This worked very good Being big & tall
customer_reviews.text: This worked very good Being big & tall, this was both large & sturdy. Only problem I had was the water collecting in the legs during showering.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My husband gets up several times a night and with hip surgery looming, and can't do a lot of walking. Use on his side of bed and he loves it. Meets all his requirements.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Stainbrook

customer_reviews.title: HUGE chair
customer_reviews.text: very sturdy chair...sheet seems kind of flimsy. Make sure it will fit in your bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Knutson

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy bedside potty chair. Nice and roomy. We expect it to last many years.
customer_reviews.author: Pjam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my grandma
customer_reviews.text: We were looking high and low for a chair that would be comfortable for my 87yr old 300lb grandma. It was perfect. Super sturdy and exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, easy to assemble and adjust height
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value, easy to assemble and adjust height. The bucket slides out and is no longer needed. The chair is great for dressing, hair cuts, etc. Folds away for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's great, it goes over the toilet
customer_reviews.text: It's great, it goes over the toilet... but I wish it had splash guards to keep everything going into the toilet, it hasn't been a problem, but would still be nice.
customer_reviews.author: UnicornOwl

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: Very spacious for someone recovering from a hip replacement procedure.
customer_reviews.author: Yo D. Williams

customer_reviews.title: holds up well
customer_reviews.text: the commode is well made the only problem is the seat tries to come off sometimes when cleaning
customer_reviews.author: Glen Comstock

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Toilet lid could be sturdier and larger since it’s a bariatric seat.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Pierpont

customer_reviews.title: Stability
customer_reviews.text: I like how sturdy and wide the product is which I believe it more sturdy and stable.
customer_reviews.author: Novotz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: Needed for bedside patient. Only used twice. However, would recommend for a very heavy person. Plenty of room. Easy assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Alma Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Please advise
customer_reviews.text: After one week the top keeps coming off everytime I open it. The seat is not sturdy. This is very frustrating especially since it cost me $85.00.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: damaged
customer_reviews.text: package arrived today, box smashed has rubbed spot on lid about the size of a quarter that would not rub out
customer_reviews.author: pappaw troy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Great product...had ankle surgery and have a low toilet...put this over top of my toilet and I was good to go! Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: valerie a carr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality-made product. Very pleased with product. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Foldable
customer_reviews.text: Just what it looks like sturdy and foldable for travel worked out well and order the bucket liners they are great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: seems like good construction
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my father, seems like good construction, feels solid, he's been using it for about 3 months now and likes it
customer_reviews.author: Carl Alessandro

customer_reviews.title: She said besides the hole being very small it’s a good seat!
customer_reviews.text: The biggest problem with this is the hole in the seat is to way to small !!!!! Ordered for a client a senior.
customer_reviews.author: Lady

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together and fit where I needed it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together, the first time there were no accidents
customer_reviews.author: linda k wigmore

customer_reviews.title: Drive Brand Great Products!!
customer_reviews.text: The Drivebrand makes some of the best medial supplies to date. So far, I've purchased a Tub bench, and a Commode both products were quality made and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, but had a very hard time putting it together!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Its was easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: It is for my husband's use while recuperating from his knee injury
customer_reviews.author: ronald mckofke

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Rehabbing knee replacement. Perfect for my needs. I was able to fit it right over our toilet so I could use the hand rails for support.
customer_reviews.author: Vida Albert

customer_reviews.title: this outfit works great, has a easy time getting on it
customer_reviews.text: My son is a very large man with no use of his legs.this outfit works great,has a easy time getting on it.very well build
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: The most important thing to know was that the product was just like what was advertised. Thank you
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the product was easy to assemble. It met all of my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I just set this seat right over the commode. Works great for my mom & everybody else, we just leave it in place all the time.
customer_reviews.author: CROWfan

customer_reviews.title: Good product, poor instructions
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the needs of a heavier patient. One star deduction because assembly instructions were frustratingly unclear, with several necessary pieces of information simply left out. These instructions were probably written by someone who does not think in terms of customer unfamiliarity with either the product or the jargon. Nonetheless, this commode seems well made and sturdy. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy

customer_reviews.title: This has worked out great for my mom since she gets up so much ...
customer_reviews.text: This has worked out great for my mom since she gets up so much during the night. It's right by her bed so she doesn't have far to go. However, her skin kept getting pinched between the seat and the bar under it until we put some foam around the bar.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

product_meta.title: Drive Medical Heavy Duty Bariatric Folding Commode, Gray
product_meta.description: The deluxe heavy duty bariatric folding bedside commode seat by Drive Medical is designed to meet your needs. The frame can be configured to be used as a bedside commode, toilet safety frame, elevated toilet seat or over your existing toilet. The tool free removable back makes configuring the commode easy for any application. The armrests provide a comfortable place to rest on when sitting and indicate a safe place to grab making sitting and standing easier. The push button height adjustable legs makes sizing a breeze allowing this commode to be used as an elevated toilet seat. In addition to comfort this commode can be folded with out tools making storage and travel convenient. The grey power coated steel welded construction ensures strength and durability able to hold up to 650 lbs. The product comes complete with a 16.5" deep snap on seat and lid, 12-quart commode bucket with cover and convenient carry handle, plus splash guard.
feature_bullets: Tool-free assembly in 3 easy steps. The push button height adjustable legs makes sizing a breeze allowing this commode to be used as an elevated toilet seat
Easily opens and folds for storage and transportation
Durable plastic 16 1/2" deep snap-on seat with lid
Comes complete with 12 qt commode bucket with carry handle, cover and splash shield
Overall Dimensions: 18"(L) x 31.75"(W) x 15.5"(H); Seat Dimensions: 16.5"(D) x 13.5"(W) x 15.5-22"(H); Width Between Arms: 24"; Weight Capacity: 650 lbs

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
